name: GHOS
description:
It`s my first LudumDare gamejam. I made this game in about a day. Hope you like it!

Description- You play as a ghost, that isnt solid, and so you is going deeper and deeper. But you have a hook, that you can controll. Goal of this game is to spook as many peoples as you can.

Controls- WASD to move the hook R to restart

Downloads and Links
